languages.text: Вы помогли Каллигосу Винтерскейлу узреть скверну в душе, и первой платой на пути к искуплению стал его сломанный позвоночник.
You helped Calligos Winterscale see the corruption in his soul, and his broken spine became his first step toward redemption.
languages.original_text: Вы помогли Каллигосу Винтерскейлу узреть скверну в душе, и первой платой на пути к искуплению стал его сломанный позвоночник.

traits.locale_text: You helped Calligos Winterscale see the corruption in his soul, and his broken spine became his first step toward redemption.
You helped Calligos Winterscale see the corruption in his soul, and his broken spine became his first step toward redemption.
You helped Calligos Winterscale see the corruption in his soul, and his broken spine became his first step toward redemption.

You helped Calligos Winterscale see the corruption in his soul, and his broken spine became his first step toward redemption.

languages.text: Vous avez aidé Calligos Winterscale à prendre conscience de la corruption de son âme et sa colonne vertébrale brisée est devenue son premier pas vers la rédemption.
languages.original_text: You helped Calligos Winterscale see the corruption in his soul, and his broken spine became his first step toward redemption.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez aidé Calligos Winterscale à prendre conscience de la corruption de son âme et sa colonne vertébrale brisée est devenue son premier pas vers la rédemption.

languages.text: Ayudaste a Calligos Winterscale a ver la corrupción de su alma, dejando que su espinazo roto fuera su primer paso hacia la redención.
languages.original_text: You helped Calligos Winterscale see the corruption in his soul, and his broken spine became his first step toward redemption.

traits.locale_text: Ayudaste a Calligos Winterscale a ver la corrupción de su alma, dejando que su espinazo roto fuera su primer paso hacia la redención.

languages.text: カリゴス・ウィンタースケールが魂の腐敗に気付くのを助け、その折れた背骨は救済への第一歩となりました。
languages.original_text: You helped Calligos Winterscale see the corruption in his soul, and his broken spine became his first step toward redemption.

traits.locale_text: カリゴス・ウィンタースケールが魂の腐敗に気付くのを助け、その折れた背骨は救済への第一歩となりました。

languages.text: 你帮助卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔看到了他灵魂中的腐化，而他那折断的脊梁成为了他迈向救赎的第一步。
languages.original_text: You helped Calligos Winterscale see the corruption in his soul, and his broken spine became his first step toward redemption.

traits.locale_text: 你帮助卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔看到了他灵魂中的腐化，而他那折断的脊梁成为了他迈向救赎的第一步。

languages.text: Du hast Calligos Winterzunder geholfen, die Verderbnis in seiner Seele zu erkennen. Sein gebrochenes Rückgrat wurde zu seinem ersten Schritt auf dem Pfad zur Erlösung.
languages.original_text: You helped Calligos Winterscale see the corruption in his soul, and his broken spine became his first step toward redemption.

traits.locale_text: Du hast Calligos Winterzunder geholfen, die Verderbnis in seiner Seele zu erkennen. Sein gebrochenes Rückgrat wurde zu seinem ersten Schritt auf dem Pfad zur Erlösung.
